field.fieldname: (select isnull(sum(OAOfficeBuyDet.Number),0) from OAOfficeBuyDet where OAOfficeBuyDet.GoodsCode = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCode)
(select isnull(sum(OAOfficeStat.GoodsNumber),0) from OAOfficeStat where OAOfficeBuyDet.GoodsCode = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCode)
(select isnull(sum(GoodsNumber),0) from OAOfficeBorrow where OAOfficeBorrow.GoodsCode = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCode)
(select isnull(sum(GoodsNumber),0) from OAOfficeReturns where OAOfficeReturns.GoodsCode = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCode)

SQL.text: select vbCrLf tblGoods.GoodsFullName as GoodsFullName,vbCrLf (select isnull(sum(OAOfficeBuyDet.Number),0) from OAOfficeBuyDet where OAOfficeBuyDet.GoodsCode = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCode) as BGoodsNumber,vbCrLf (select isnull(sum(OAOfficeStat.GoodsNumber),0) from OAOfficeStat where OAOfficeBuyDet.GoodsCode = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCode) as GoodsNumber,vbCrLf (select isnull(sum(GoodsNumber),0) from OAOfficeBorrow where OAOfficeBorrow.GoodsCode = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCode) as RGoodsNumber,vbCrLf (select isnull(sum(GoodsNumber),0) from OAOfficeReturns where OAOfficeReturns.GoodsCode = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCode) as OGoodsNumbervbCrLffrom OAOfficeStatvbCrLfleft join tblGoods on tblGoods.id = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCodevbCrLfleft join OAOfficeBuyDet on OAOfficeBuyDet.GoodsCode = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCodevbCrLfleft join OAOfficeBorrow on OAOfficeBorrow.GoodsCode = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCodevbCrLfleft join OAOfficeReturns on OAOfficeReturns.GoodsCode = OAOfficeStat.GoodsCodevbCrLfwhere 1=1 vbCrLf and (tblGoods.GoodsFullName like '%'+?+'%')vbCrLfvbCrLf vbCrLf
